sourcesContent:
<template>
  <b-table class="table table-striped table-hover table-bordered align-middle">
    <thead>
      <tr>
        <th class="w-25">Title</th>
        <th class="w-50">Description</th>
        <th class="w-25">Options</th>
      </tr>
    </thead>
    <tbody class="">
      <tr :key="article.id" v-for="article in articles">
        <Article @delete-article="$emit('delete-article', article.id)"  :article="article" />
      </tr>
    </tbody>
  </b-table>
  <b-pagination
    v-model="currentPage"
    :total-rows="rows"
    :per-page="perPage"
    aria-controls="my-table"
  ></b-pagination>
</template>

<script>
import Article from "./Article.vue";

export default {
  name: "Articles",
  props: {
    articles: Array,
  },
  components: {
    Article,
  },
  emits: ["delete-article"],
};
</script>
